name: Buzzled
description:
This game was made for Brackey 2020.2 game jam. If you like it please check that game out and rate my game. 

You are trapped in a room where the only way to go is right. You navigate between those room using your past self's help. He can interact with the pressure plate and yourself but there is a catch, you MUST not  be seen by him!!

This is a puzzle game where you use your past self's help to go through the rooms while avoiding his eye contact.

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • R to Reset to the beginning
  • X  to go back in time
